animeDescription: Extra anime shorts included on DVD.  Episode 1: Summer Memories (Vol. 1) Episode 2: The Meteor Distance (Vol. 3) Episode 3: Twinkle Star (Vol. 5)  Note: Music video specials are not included in the entry as they don't contain any new scenes.
